meta.title: You.v2 - Rapid Subconscious Reprogramming Program
meta.description: You.v2 is a rapid and gentle subconscious reprogramming program for Russian-speaking global leaders and helping professionals who feel inexplicably blocked by old patterns and beliefs despite external success.

hero.title: You lead, guide, and support others — but you know it's time to focus on yourself.
hero.subtitle: A structured and personalized hypnotherapy approach to end self-sabotage by working directly with your subconscious — where real change begins.
hero.description1: Your subconscious mind holds the patterns that keep you stuck — and the power to change everything.
hero.description2: You don't need more willpower. You need access to the part of your mind where real change begins.
hero.description3: You've done the mindset work. You've tried therapy. But something deeper still holds you back.
hero.description4: It's time to work with your subconscious mind — where lasting change begins.
hero.ctaMicrocopy: No obligation. 100% confidential. Best for those who've already tried the traditional approaches.

howItWorks.title: This isn't therapy. It's reprogramming.
howItWorks.description1: Your subconscious is your internal operating system — and it was installed before you had a say. It runs your emotions, your impulses, your loyalties.
howItWorks.description2: Logic doesn't reach it. Coaching can't override it. Motivation bounces off it. That's why most change fails — or exhausts you.
howItWorks.callout: Between your conscious and your subconscious is a firewall: the critical factor. It protects old identity code. Until we bypass it, you'll stay loyal to beliefs you no longer need.
howItWorks.description3: Most traditional approaches work on the levels of environment, behavior, and knowledge. But real change should happen at the level where the problem originated. With my help, you will use deep system-level interventions to rewrite that code — precisely, calmly, permanently.
howItWorks.tagline: We don't fix symptoms. We reprogram the system.
howItWorks.quote: "You've worked hard at the behavior level. It's time to reset where it actually matters."

theWhy.title: The Why
theWhy.promise: Through this work, I'll teach you how to access and use the power of your own subconscious mind — so that you can stop self-sabotaging, achieve your goals more easily, and continue creating meaningful change long after our work is done.
theWhy.vision: My work is about more than personal change. It's about breaking generational patterns, removing invisible blocks, and making sure that the pain you carry doesn't get passed down to your children. I do this because I like to create more happy people around me by liberating them from their subconscious limiting beliefs and patterns that no longer serve them.

isThisForYou.title: Is This For You?
bullets: You feel stuck despite external success
You're ready to do deep work with lasting impact
You help others every day, but have no one to help you
isThisForYou.description1: This work is especially effective for people in helping roles — coaches, therapists, doctors, lawyers, business leaders — because you understand change, and you're ready to do the work that goes beyond what most methods can reach.
isThisForYou.description2: This work is for people who are truly ready. Not to talk, cope, or hope — but to actually change.

clientStories.title: Client Stories
stories: After just one session, I felt like years of emotional weight lifted off. — Anna, Executive Coach
This work gave me tools I still use every day — real transformation. — Jordan, Tech Founder
I've done coaching, therapy, even retreats. Nothing got to the root like this did. The shifts were deep and lasting. — Elena, Entrepreneur
I didn't expect to feel this clear after just two weeks. I finally stopped repeating the same self-destructive cycle. — Dmitry, Product Manager

whatMakesDifferent.title: What Makes You.v2 Different?

differentiators.title: Structured work with defined time frame
differentiators.desc: Not an open-ended process—get results fast with a proven protocol.

differentiators.title: Personal engineering, not therapy
differentiators.desc: Uses subconscious methods (regression, parts work) for real, structural change.

differentiators.title: Clear, lasting outcome
differentiators.desc: Internal reprogramming that sticks—not just coping tools or advice.

differentiators.title: Confidential & deep
differentiators.desc: A safe space for complex emotional, behavioral, or compulsive patterns.

whatMakesDifferent.quote: Other methods help you cope. I help you rewrite the code.

issues.title: Issues We Can Address
issues.intro: I work with professionals who have achieved a lot — yet still feel that something isn't right beneath the surface. Here are just a few areas where subconscious reprogramming can create powerful change:

items.title: External success — but love feels impossible
items.desc: You've built a career, solved big problems, earned respect. But in relationships, you keep hitting the same walls: distance, pain, self-doubt. It's not bad luck — it reflects a root issue.

items.title: Money comes — and then disappears
items.desc: You earn well, but you can't grow further. Fear of big numbers, guilt around success, inner conflict between safety and freedom — this isn't about the market. It's about your internal structure.

items.title: You — or someone close — suddenly changed
items.desc: After an illness, surgery, accident, or even intense stress, something feels off. Like part of you is missing. This work helps with what logic can't explain.

items.title: You don't want to become your parents — but you're already repeating them
items.desc: Guilt, frustration, emotional distance with your child — these often echo patterns you lived through yourself. We can stop inherited pain from passing forward.

items.title: Irrational moods, fears, or desires
items.desc: Anxiety, irritability, mood swings, irrational fears and urges — these aren't flaws in your personality. They're often signs your subconscious is working overtime to manage something unresolved.

items.title: Unexplained physical symptoms or habits
items.desc: Compulsive behaviors, physical tension, headaches, and unexplained symptoms often start as the subconscious trying to protect you. They need to be decoded and processed — not ignored.

issues.outro: Every person is different. If you don't see your situation here — reach out. I work with people, not labels. Every story can be rewritten.

precision.title: This Isn't Coaching. This Is Clinical-Grade Precision.
precision.intro: I don't follow scripts. I don't work from templates. This isn't about motivation or mindset — it's about reprogramming the systems that run your inner world.

bullets.heading: It's deep because it has to be.
bullets.desc: I work at the level where real patterns live — and that takes more skill, more care, and more responsibility than surface-level tools.

bullets.heading: I've seen the edge — and know when to stop.
bullets.desc: I've worked with real psychiatric and cognitive cases. I know when something is outside scope — and I know what's safe.

bullets.heading: This isn't just knowledge. It's lived expertise.
bullets.desc: Medical training. Systems thinking. Subconscious work. Clinical research. This isn't a method I bought — it's the result of everything I've studied, seen, and tested in real life.

bullets.heading: I've Been There — That's Why I Know It Works.
bullets.desc: I've done this work myself. I know what it's like to carry patterns you didn't choose — and to break them. That's why I take this process seriously. It's not theory. It's personal.

roi.title: Cost Comparison

rows.depth: Deep, ecological, and complete resolution of your issue
rows.cost: What is it worth to you?

roi.supporting: Everything else is maintenance. You.v2 is a solution.

about.title: About the Creator
about.name: Dr. Sebastian Kristof
credentials: Former psychiatrist with postdoctoral training at Yale and UCSD
Subconscious strategist for high-performing clients who need deep, fast change
about.quote: "I don't give advice or teach to think positively. I change internal architecture. Gently. Precisely. Permanently."

globalPros.title: Built for Global Russian-Speaking Professionals
globalPros.subtitle: You work and think in English. But your subconscious mind was programmed in your first language. Therapy in English misses your roots. Therapy in Russian misses your real life.
globalPros.preludeHighlight: In short, you need someone who understands both the life you live now — and the "multiki" you watched as a kid.
points: I work in English, Russian, or both — whatever your mind needs.
I was raised to succeed and stay silent — I know what that costs.
I've worked through the legacy of a difficult past — and I'll help you do the same.
globalPros.quote: You succeed in English, but your inner child still speaks Russian.
globalPros.ctaPrompt: Ready to integrate both sides of yourself?

clientStory.title: Client Story
clientStory.quote: "I was stuck for 7 months, circling the same project and feeling blocked. By the third session, something unhooked — I launched it, and we did $90k. But more than that? I actually felt calm doing it."
clientStory.author: — Anonymous founder, Berlin
clientStory.femalePerspective: "I held everyone else together, balancing leadership and personal well-being felt impossible until I found a space to truly reset." — Anonymous You V2 Client

items.question: Is this therapy?
items.answer: No. It's faster, deeper, and structurally targeted.

items.question: Is this remote?
items.answer: Yes. All sessions are online and timezone-flexible.

items.question: Do I need to believe in anything for it to work?
items.answer: No. The process works whether or not you believe in it. You just need to show up.

items.question: What if I've already done a lot of therapy?
items.answer: Perfect. That means you've cleared the surface. This goes deeper.

items.question: How soon will I notice changes?
items.answer: Most clients report noticeable shifts after the first or second session. The full protocol ensures these changes are structural and lasting.

pricing.quote: This isn't therapy. It's a structural reset. For people who've survived enough — and are ready to actually live.
